contentrichtext.text: '''Daniel Bruce Goforth''' is a former [[United States Democratic Party|Democratic]] member of the [[North Carolina General Assembly]] who represented the state's one hundred fifteenth [[North Carolina House of Representatives|House]] district, including constituents in [[Buncombe County, North Carolina|Buncombe]] County. A contractor from [[Asheville, North Carolina]], Goforth served almost four complete terms in the state House. He resigned in 2010 before the end of his fourth term, after losing the Democratic nomination for a fifth term to [[Patsy Keever]].<ref>[http://projects.newsobserver.com/under_the_dome/goforth_leaves_his_house_seat News & Observer: Goforth leaves his House seat]</ref> In 2011 he joined the Republican Party.<ref>[http://www.bluenc.com/former-asheville-democrat-rep-bruce-goforth-switches-party-goes-work-gop Former Asheville Democrat Rep. Bruce Goforth switches party.
